title: INE - CCIE Data Center - Unified Computing
description:
CCIE Data Center :: Unified Computing Outline :: Runtime 20 hours 53 minutes 
Instructor: Mark Snow
Released: 2012
Video Format: MOV
Resolution: 1280x720
File Size: 4.94 GB

This online course is taught by Mark Snow, CCIEx2 #14073 (Voice, Security). Follow along as Mark explains the technologies related to the Cisco Unified Computing System components of the modern Cisco Data Center. The instructor also demonstrates the configuration of advanced technology-focused scenarios, along with proper verification and troubleshooting techniques.
